Translations.Text: dhalika l-kitabu la rayba fihi hudan lil'muttaqina
alladhina yu'minuna bil-ghaybi wayuqimuna l-salata wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
wa-alladhina yu'minuna bima unzila ilayka wama unzila min qablika wabil-akhirati hum yuqinuna
ulaika Ê¿ala hudan min rabbihim wa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
